name: Cody Linley - More Than Just Jake Ryan Trivia Game | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what movie did Cody Linley and two friends try to save an owl family's habitat?
options: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
questions.explanation:
Hoot.

	Cody Linley played Mullet Fingers in "Hoot" (2006). Mullet Fingers is the step brother of Beatrice Leep, a girl the main character, Roy, befriends. The main character, Roy, moves to a new city, and learns of some new construction.  However, he finds a family of burrowing owls nesting on the grounds, and he, Beatrice, and Mullet all try to stop the construction from ruining the owl's habitat.

questions.text: What is Cody Linley's full name?
questions.explanation:
Cody Martin Linley.

	Cody Linley's full name is Cody Martin Linley, but likes to go by Cody.  Cody Martin is also the name of the character from "The Suite Life of Zack and Cody" that Cole Sprouse plays.

questions.text: What elementary school did Cody Linley attend?
questions.explanation:
Degan Elementary School.

	The school mascot for Degan is the Golden Eagle.  The school is one of the oldest in Cody's hometown, Lewisville, Texas, where he grew up.  Brenda Rogers was his principal.

questions.text: Cody Linley played Daryl in the episode "Five Finger Discount" on what Disney Channel show?
options: The Suite Life of Zack and Cody
questions.explanation:
That's So Raven.

	Jake Ryan played Daryl on "That's So Raven."  He has never appeared on "Cory in the House" or "The Suite Life of Zack and Cody."  He played Jake Ryan in "Hannah Montana" for seven episodes, not Daryl!  "That's So Raven" is about a teenager, Raven, who is a psychic.  She has "occasional visions that may or may not come true."  Most of the times, it does come true, but she completely misinterprets it.  The show first aired in January of 2003.

questions.text: With whom did Cody Linley make YouTube videos with, calling their show the "Ro and Co Show?"
questions.explanation:
Roshon Fegan.

	Roshan Fegan was one of Cody's best friends, and starred in "Camp Rock."  Fegan played Sander Loya.  Cody and Roshan call their YouTube show the "Ro and Co Show," using the "Ro" in Roshon, and the "Co" in Cody.

November 20, 1989.

	Cody Martin Linley was born in 1989, in Lewisville, Texas. When he was 18 years old, he became the youngest competitor of "Dancing With the Stars."

questions.text: Cody Linley was in the movie "My Dog Skip" (2000)
questions.explanation:
True.

	"My Dog Skip" is based on a book by Willie Morris, who is also the name of the main character, played by Frankie Muniz. It is about a man who is looking back to his childhood, and how it became much better because of his dog.  Skip was a Jack Russell Terrier.  Willie is a small child with barely any friends, and is bullied by three people, one of those being Spit McGee, who is played by Cody Linley.

questions.text: Has Cody Linley ever done commercials for Zaxby's?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Zaxby's is a fast food restaurant.  The first was in Georgia, and has grown to over 450 restaurants.  Zaxby's has featured sports, TV, and video game advertisements.  Some of the commercials Cody Linley did for Zaxby's was with another Disney Channel star, Alyson Stoner.  The chain was founded in 1990.

questions.text: Cody Linley was on season 7 of "Dancing With the Stars" (early 2008).  Who was his partner?
questions.explanation:
Julianne Hough.

	Cody Linley entered "Dancing With the Stars" as their youngest competitor ever.  He was only 18 when he joined the show.  The same year, the oldest competitor, at 82, was Cloris Leachman.  Cody has proved to struggle with his "romantic side," and claims to never have been great with romance.  The first season began on June 1st, 2005, and there are two seasons every year.

questions.text: What team was Cody Linley in for the 2008 "Disney Channel Games?"
questions.explanation:
None of these.

	Cody Linley was not on any team, as he did not participate in the "Disney Channel Games" of 2008!  However, he was an extra online host, along with Meaghan Jette Martin.  Brian Stepanek and Phil Lewis are the main hosts of the show, both from "The Suite Life of Zack and Cody."  Brain plays Arwin and Phil plays Mr. Moseby.
